page.title: 11EMMA'S DAY IN HAXEY
page.content: playground!""Else?"I say under my breath. I thought that I'd put on my tracksuit trousers with my I love dancing sweatshirt.I went into the bathroom for a wash.I came back into my bedroom and put my clothes on.My bedroom has a green carpet and white walls.Two walls have wallpaper on with wild roses and thrushes.As soon as you go into the room you see a wardrobe, next to that a bookcase,then a chest of drawers.There is then a small space before you see my dressing table.There's a window next to the dressing table and then at the other side of my room,a Sindy house.After that,last but not least,my bed. After I'd made my bed,I went down for breakfast.While I was waiting for the toast,I played hopscotch on the patio."Dash!I missed four!"I stamped
